item_category: The HUAWEI P smart 2021 Smartphone has a 6.67" FHD+ display and a remarkable 90.3% screen-to-body ratio. It features as 5000 mAh large battery which collaborates with the intelligent AI power-saving algorithm as well as 22.5 W HUAWEI SuperCharge. Unlock your phone with the side mounted fingerprint. Touch gently on the side to wake up and unlock your phone securely, in a split second. The 4GB RAM effectively allows you to run multiple Apps simultaneously, while the 128GB ROM gives you access to the storage you need for all your favourites.
